name: ASAccountAuthenticationModificationControllerDelegate

items.name: func accountAuthenticationModificationController(ASAccountAuthenticationModificationController, didSuccessfullyComplete: ASAccountAuthenticationModificationRequest, userInfo: [AnyHashable : Any]?)
